name: Software Engineer
description: Develop and maintain web applications using modern frameworks and languages. Requires experience in Python and JavaScript.

name: Data Analyst
description: Analyze large datasets to provide actionable insights using SQL, Python, and visualization tools like Tableau.

name: UX/UI Designer
description: Design user-friendly interfaces for mobile and web applications, collaborating with developers and product managers.

name: DevOps Engineer
description: Manage cloud infrastructure and CI/CD pipelines using tools like Docker, Kubernetes, and AWS.

name: Project Manager
description: Oversee software development projects, ensuring timely delivery and coordination between cross-functional teams.
